course.title: PSY 6134 Test Construction and Psychometric Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Issues relevant to the design, construction, and validation of psychometric assessment devices with applications to research. Special topics to include item construction, open-ended items, multiple-choice items, applications of exploratory and confirmatory factor analysis, construct validity, measures of internal consistency and reliability, item analysis, and cross-linguistic adaption of assessment devices.Course Component: Lecture
